name: bowtie-vanilla-ja-demo
description: A pure-Javascript demo showing how to use the Young Alfred Bowtie SDK

scripts.build: rimraf build/* && webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp -R images build/
scripts.server: npm run build && cd ../demo-server && cross-env BOWTIE_STATIC_CONTENT='../vanilla-js/build' node index.js

author: Young Alfred Inc. <bowtie@youngalfred.com>
